Design.title: Design and Consultancy
Design.description: Every good playground starts with a good plan. Our experts focus not only on aesthetics but also on strict compliance with MSZ EN 1176 standards. We help with optimal spatial layout for a safe play experience.

Manufacturing.title: Premium Manufacturing
Manufacturing.description: We are manufacturers, not just traders. This allows us to serve custom needs. Our CNC-controlled technology and selected UV-stable materials ensure durability and vandal-resistant construction.

Installation.title: On-site Installation
Installation.description: Our own installation team handles concreting, equipment fixation, and impact-absorbing surfacing (rubber tiles, pea gravel, bark mulch). We hand over the site clean and tidy.

Maintenance.title: Maintenance and Inspection
Maintenance.description: Maintaining safety is an ongoing task. We undertake ad-hoc repairs, mandatory annual safety inspections, and maintenance of playgrounds to ensure they serve the community for years.

items.question: How much warranty do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a 5-year full warranty on all equipment manufactured and installed by us, under normal use.

items.question: What certifications do the equipments have?
items.answer: Our products possess the MSZ EN 1176 compliance certificate issued by TÜV, making them suitable for public use.

items.question: Do you maintain equipment from other manufacturers?
items.answer: Yes, our expert team undertakes the renovation and standardization of existing playgrounds, regardless of the manufacturer.

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Manufacturing and installation typically take 4-8 weeks from the order date, depending on the project size.

Hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about playground construction, standards, and maintenance.

general.question: How can I request a quote?
general.answer: The easiest way to request a quote is by filling out our online form under the 'Contact' menu, or by emailing us directly at info@terrafortebau.hu.

general.question: How long does manufacturing take?
general.answer: Manufacturing time usually takes 4–8 weeks depending on project size and our production capacity, starting from order confirmation.

safety.question: Are the playground equipment compliant with the MSZ EN 1176 standard?
safety.answer: Yes, all equipment we manufacture and install is certified by TÜV according to the MSZ EN 1176 standard, making them suitable for public use.

safety.question: Is a building permit required for a playground?
safety.answer: In most cases, installing playground equipment does not require a building permit, but we always recommend confirming with the local municipality.

installation.question: What kind of ground preparation is required?
installation.answer: The area must be level and load-bearing. A detailed foundation plan and required layer structure will be provided after signing the contract.

installation.question: Do you also install impact-absorbing surfaces?
installation.answer: Yes, we provide full installation services, including rubber tiles, pea gravel, pine bark, or poured rubber surfaces.

maintenance.question: What warranty do you offer?
maintenance.answer: We provide a full 5-year warranty on all equipment when used as intended (excluding wear-and-tear parts).

maintenance.question: Do you offer annual inspections?
maintenance.answer: Yes, together with our accredited partners, we perform mandatory annual standard compliance inspections and documentation.
